New Dorchester playground- lower level- view 1
Woodcliff Middle School - back view of Media Center with basketball court
Woodcliff Lake Middle School -Media Center - side view

div.p: The Woodcliff Lake School District serves the community residents of the Borough of Woodcliff Lake, New Jersey. The school and community are located in Bergen County and are situated in the northern part of this county. All school-age students are served through a variety of programs in grades pre-kindergarten through eighth grade. High school aged students in the community attend the Pascack Hills High School.
Ms. Pennello and the WCMS staff wanted to give you a taste of Frozen Jr...from a distance. Enjoy "In Quarantine"
Go to the App Store to download our District app on your mobile device.
If you have not already registered for our district's emergency alerts, please click here to register. This list will only be updated at the end of each month.

If you have already registered but would like to update your information, please go to MyCallNow and click the green "Sign Up" button to create an account. You will then be able to edit your contact information.
